title: In the Mind's Eye
creator_contributor_role: Diploma of Multimedia, Swinburne University of Technology (TAFE Division), production facilities
abstract: How do you communicate? Do you really listen?
description: The final outcome from  a work experience project with Swinburne Unversity of Technology (TAFE) Multimedia Course, Computing and IT Department. "How do you communicate? Do you really listen? Do you respond to what's been said or do you just talk about your own memory and experience? Dive into "The minds eye", a small film that explores what it will take for us to pay attention and react. Directed Written  and Produced by Jess Chapkoun, Emma Buckland and David Blake. Music by Susan Ellis & Stuart Porter and Ivan Rosa & Matthew Farrington
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
